To expel wind and eliminate phlegm: For apoplexy and epilepsy, used with Radix Curcumae together. In addation, also used hyperlipemia. Morinda root (Bajitian) is used with Teasel root (Xuduan), Mulberry mistletoe (Sangjisheng) and Hypoglauca yam (Bixie) for cold sensation and pain in the lumbar region and knees or motor impairment.

Indication: 1. Artemisinine from its volatile oil is an effective antimalarial agent on mice, monkey, chicken and human malaria. The therapeutic effect of artemisinie is similar to that of chloroquine.2. Antipyretic.

Function: 1. Treatment of dysuria and edema. Abutilon (Dongkuizi) is used with Poria (Fuling) and White atractylodes (Baizhu). 2. Treatment of scanty urine with blood and painful urination. Abutilon (Dongkuizi) is used with Amomum fruit (Sharen) and Ricepaper pith (Tongcao). 4. Treatment of constipation. Function: 1. Treatment of deficient spleen not transforming and transporting water manifested as lassitude, poor appetite, loose stool or diarrhea, or leukorrhea due to downward flowing of turbid dampness. Hyacinth bean (Biandou) is used with Ginseng (Renshen), White atractylodes (Baizhu) and Poria (Fuling) in the formula Shen Ling Baizhu San. 2. Treatment of disharmony of the spleen and stomach due to invasion from exogenous pathogenic summer-damp-heat manifested as vomiting and diarrhea. Hyacinth bean (Biandou) is used with Elsholtzia (Xiangru) and Magnolia bark (Houpo) in the formula Xiangru San.

Cockroach (Chechong) may also be taken alone.

Indication: Pain wind, wind-damp impediment pain, cough of phlegm-rheum, pulmonary welling abscess, edema, lump glomus, jaundice, amenorrhea, child gan accumulation, urticaria, knocks and falls.

Indication: Hypertension, cerebral and cardiovascular diseases, wind-damp impediment pain, limp aching lumbus and knees, stirring fetus in pregnancy.

Function: To engender liquid, moisten intestines, quicken blood, disperse accumulation.
Indication: Scant fluid and thirst, intestinal dry and constipation, amenorrhea, accumulation-gathering.

Function: To suppress cough, supplement vacuity.
Indication: Spasmodic cough, trachitis, vacuity weakness, inhibited urination.

Function: To clear lung, cool blood, transform damp, resolve toxin.
Indication: Lung heat cough, hemoptysis, nosebleed(epistaxis), flooding and spotting, vaginal discharge, dysentery, red and white turbidity, swelling toxin of welling abscess and sore.

Herb_latin_name: Ficus beecheyana [Syn. Ficus erecta var. beecheyana]

Indication: Enteritis, dysentery, constipation, hemorrhoids, throat pain, welling abscessand sores, scab and lichen.

Function: To moisten lung and relieve cough, move qi and fortify stomach, clear heat and disinhibit damp, cool blood and stanch bleeding.
Indication: Lung heat cough, pain in stomach duct and abdomen, jaundice, swelling pain from hemorrhoids, knocks and falls, hemoptysis, menstrual disorder, flooding and spotting, bleeding due to external injury, dizziness, emission.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, disinhibit urine and disperse edema, enrich and supplement [5509].

Function: To promote blood circulation, to eliminate phlegm, and to relax the bowels.

Function: To dispel wind and damp, and to relieve nasal obstruction.

Clinical_manifestations: 1. Lowering blood sugar, with similar mechanism as phenethyl biguanide ( DBI ). 2. Its chief poisonous component is rhamnose. The toxic effects in rats, guinea-pigs and rabbits by different routes of administration are similar. LD50 is 0.93g/kg in mice.

Function: External use for eczema, scabies, otits media with purulent discaharge, internal use for chronic diarrhea, hematochezia, abnormal uterine bleeding, epilepsy and mania.ALUMEN (CALCINED) - Eczema, discharge from ulcers otitis media with purulent discharge, excessive leukorrhea with pudendal itching, bleeding from the nose or gums, nasal polyp.
Indication: 1. To astringe the intestine and relieve diarrhea (for prolonged diarrhea, used with Fructus Chebulae together). 2. To astringe and stop bleeding, hemoptysis and bleeding from the gum (both internal and external use). 3. To reduce exudation, relieve itching, clear toxic material and kill parasite: For burn, mixed with Borneolum Syntheticum and water for topical use; for skin infection, mixed with Realgar and tea for local application; for scabies and tinea, used together with Sulfur and Borneolum Syntheticum; for aphthae and suppurative ostitis media, used together with Borneolum Syntheticum and Borax, for eczema, 1% Alumen solution used as local compress. 4. To expel wind and eliminate phlegm: For apoplexy and epilepsy, used with Radix Curcumae together. In addation, also used hyperlipemia. Topical injection for mixture of 3-10% Alumen solution and 2% novocain may be used for prolapse of rectum, prolapse of uterus and hemorrhoids.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. To astringe the intestine and relieve diarrhea (for prolonged diarrhea, used with Fructus Chebulae together). 2. To astringe and stop bleeding, hemoptysis and bleeding from the gum (both internal and external use). 3. To reduce exudation, relieve itchi
Therapeutic_en_class: Toxication reduction, anthelmintic, dampness removal, and itching control

Function: 1. Treatment of deficient spleen not transforming and transporting water manifested as lassitude, poor appetite, loose stool or diarrhea, or leukorrhea due to downward flowing of turbid dampness. Hyacinth bean (Biandou) is used with Ginseng (Renshen), White atractylodes (Baizhu) and Poria (Fuling) in the formula Shen Ling Baizhu San. 2. Treatment of disharmony of the spleen and stomach due to invasion from exogenous pathogenic summer-damp-heat manifested as vomiting and diarrhea. Hyacinth bean (Biandou) is used with Elsholtzia (Xiangru) and Magnolia bark (Houpo) in the formula Xiangru San.
Indication: Containing phytoagglutintin, trypsin and amylase inhibitors.
Clinical_manifestations: Containing phytoagglutintin, trypsin and amylase inhibitors.

Acclerating the metabolism of lipids and cholesterol.5. LD50 of aconitine is 0.295mg/kg in mice hypodermally and that of the decoction of prepared aconite is 17.42g/kg in mice orally.6. Indication: 1. Aconitine is a physiologically active component, and becomes aconine after hydrolized. The toxicity of aconine is lower than aconitine.2. The prepared products may dilate the blood vessels of lower limbs and coronary artery, and increase coronary flow.3. Aconine and hypaconitine are analgesics and sedatives.4. Acclerating the metabolism of lipids and cholesterol.5. LD50 of aconitine is 0.295mg/kg in mice hypodermally and that of the decoction of prepared aconite is 17.42g/kg in mice orally.6. Its components, higenamine and coryneine chloride exert a significant cardiotonic effect.

Chrysophanol, one of the active components, is a laxative.5. Bacteriostatic.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Oral adminstration of the hearbal powder can inhibit the rising of serum cholesterol and formation of atherosclerosis in rabbits.2. Its tincture and infusion can inhibit the myocardium of toad in vitro, and contract th eblood vessels of lower limbs.3.

Its alcoholic extract and its component methoxycinnamic acid can lower the typhoid vaccine-induced fever in rabbits.2. Its water or alcoholic infusion and decoction exert a mild hypotensive effect on anesthetized animals3. Lowering the level of blood sugar.4. Its infusion inhibits the growth of some dermatomyces.

Oral use of its extract reduces the raio of serum cholesterol and total phospholipid in rabbits with hypercholesterolemia.6. Chrysophanol, an other active component, exerts a hemostatic effect.

Dragon's blood (Xuejie) is used with Frankincense (Ruxiang) and Myrrh (Moyao) in the formula Qili San.

Function: 1. Treatment of infantile convulsions and epilepsy. Amber (Hupo) is used with Centipede (Wugong) and Scorpion (Quanxie). 2. Treatment of palpitations, insomnia and dream-disturbed sleep. Amber (Hupo) is used with Chinese angelica root (Danggui), Zedoary (Ezhu) and Lindera root (Wuyao) in the formula Hupo San. 4. Treatment of urinary tract disorders manifested as frequent urination, painful urination, bloody urine or calculus formation in the urinary tract. Amber (Hupo) is used with Lysimachia (Jinqiancao), Clematis stem (Mutong) and Imperata rhizome (Baimaogen).

Aescuktin, another active component, exerts an antihistaminic effect and relaxes smooth muscles of guinea-pig's trachea in vitro.5. Analgesic. The effect of aescuktin is stronger than that of aspirin but weaker than codeine.

Indication: 1. To clear heat and toxic material. For lung abscess, cough due to lung-heat, also for sorethroat and skin infection. 2. To promote blood circulation to eliminate blood stasis. For menorrhalgia due to blood stasis, postpartum abdominal pain due to blood

Treatment of scrofula and goiter. Sea clam shell (Haigeke) is used with Laminaria (Kunbu), Seaweed (Haizao) and Ark shell (Walengzi) in the formula Hanhua Wan.

Indication: 1. Increasing the amount of leukocytes and polymorphoctyes in peripheral blood and promoting lymphocyte-blastogenesis. 2. Its polysaccharide promotes the healing of skin ulcer. 3. Cardiotonic. 4. Dilating coronary artery and capillaries.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, disperse swelling and expel pus, cool blood and stanch bleeding.
Indication: Intestinal welling abscess, pulmonary welling abscess, lung heat cough, enteritis, dysentery, cholecystitis, pelvic inflamation, swelling toxin of sore and boil, scrotal eczema, blood ejection, spontaneous external bleeding, flooding, knocks and falls.

Function: See Dendrobium nobile .
Indication: See Dendrobium nobile .

Function: To strengthen heart and disinhibit urine, quicken blood and regulate menstruation, clear heat and resolve toxin.
Indication: Edema due to heart disease, hepatitis, dysmenorrhea, toxin swelling of sores, mouth sore, burns and scalds, zoster, psoriasis.

Function: To transform phlegm, disinhibit diaphragm, disperse food, check vomiting.
Indication: Qi stagnation in chest and diaphragm, cough with profuse phlegm, non-digestion of food accumulation, nausea and vomiting, drunkenness.

Function: See Agaricus campestris.
Indication: See Agaricus campestris.

Function: Anticarcinoma.
Indication: Tumor.

Function: See Cinchona ledgeriana.
Indication: See Cinchona ledgeriana .

Function: To warm kidney and invigorate yang , dispel wind and overcome damp, quicken blood and free menstruation.
Indication: Impotence, weakness in lumbus and knees, wind-damp impediment pain, menstrual disorder, amenorrhea, uterus cold and abdominal pain, cold rheum cough.

Function: To expel wind, resolve summerheat, quicken blood and disperse swelling.
Indication: Wind damage common cold, summerheat stroke with sand, knocks and falls, burns and scalds.

Function: To downbear qi and disperse phlegm, calm asthma, moisten intestines.
Indication: Phlegm congestion and qi counterflow, cough and asthma, intestinal dry and constipation.

Function: To dispel wind and eliminate damp, quicken blood and relieve pain.
Indication: Rheumatic arthritis, common cold, knocks and falls, vacuity and fever.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, relieve pain.
Indication: Influenza, warm disease fever, gastritis, ulcer, dysentery, sciatica, swelling pain of sore and boil.

Function: To relieve rheumatic conditions, and to promote the flow of qi and relieve pain.
Indication: Pain in joints due to rheumatalgia, taxation damage in lumbar muscle, centipede bite.

Properties: Minor Warm; Pungent; Bitter; slightly warm
UsePart: Lycopus lucidus Turcz. var. hirtus Regel;aerial parts
Function: Treatment of menstrual disorders, amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, postpatum abdominal pain due to blood stasis, edema.1. To invigorate blood and remove stagnation; 2. To promote urination and reduce edema
Indication: Treatment of menstrual disorders, amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, postpatum abdominal pain due to blood stasis, edema.Amenorrhea, concretion and conglomeration, postpartum blood stasis abdominal pain, edema in body and face, knocks and falls, incised wound.

Function: To supplement qi and blood, boost heart and liver.
Indication: Qi-blood depletion, heart-spleen vacuity, fatigue hypodynamia, palpitation and insomnia.

Function: To eliminate inflammation and relieve pain.

TCM_name_en: Taiwan Angelica Equivalent plant: Angelica dahurica cv Qibaizhi
Function: To dispel wind and eliminate damp, free orifices and relieve pain, disperse swelling and expel pus.
Indication: Common cold with headache, eyebrow bone pain, toothache, nasal congestion, deep-source nasal congestion, enduring diarrhea due to damp, leukorrhea, sores with welling abscess and flat abscess, poisonous snake bites.

Function: To supplement qi and clear lung, boost wits and nourish heart, promote contraction and stanch bleeding, dissipate stasis and disperse swelling.
Indication: Qi vacuity and general weakness, aversion of cold during convalescence, shortness of breath and hypodynamia, lung heat cough, hemoptysis, leukorrhea, diarrhea, knocks and falls, burns and scalds, neurosis, altitude stress.

Function: To cool blood and stanch bleeding, clear heat and resolve toxin.
Indication: Bleeding, sore toxin of welling abscess and flat abscess.

Function: To dissipate blood, disinhibit urine, resolve heat toxin.
Indication: Inhibited urination, animal and insect bites.

Function: To dispel phlegm and eliminate damp, fortify spleen and supplement vacuity, quiet heart and quicken blood.
Indication: Cough with profuse phlegm, wind-damp impediment pain, dribbling pain of urination, edema, beriberi, hepatitis, tuberculosis, postpartum vacuity weakness, inappetence, child gan accumulation, insomnia and frequent dreaming, menstrual disorder, knocks and falls.

Function: To fortify spleen and check diarrhea, nourish lung and enrich kidney, resolve toxin and close sores.
Indication: Spleen vacuity diarrhea, kidney vacuity and emission, vaginal discharge, frequent urination, vacuity taxation cough, diabetes mellitus, ulcerating sores, burns and scalds.

Function: 1. To invigorate blood and stop pain; 2. To reduce swelling and promote healing
Indication: Stasis pain in chest and abdomen, amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, concretion and conglomeration, knocks and falls, swollen welling abscess and sores, intestinal welling abscess, red eyes with gall.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Its aqueous infusion inhibits the growth of skin fungi such as Trichophyton violaceum.2. Inhibiting the excessive secretion of bronchi and uterus.

Function: To dissipate cold and relieve pain, rectify qi and regulate center.
Indication: Cold pain in stomach duct and abdomen, indigestion, cold mounting with abdominal pain, menstrual disorder.

Function: To promote astriction, check diarrhea, close sores.
Indication: Damp toxin of scab sore, toothache, sore and boil in children.

Function: To reduce masses by dissipating blood stasis, and to relieve pain by removing stagnancy of food.
Indication: Treatment of mass in the abdomen, goitre with pain, epigastric pain and distension due to indigestion.

Function: See Acanthopanax gracilistylus.
Indication: See Acanthopanax gracilistylus .

TCM_name_en: leafy twigs of Oriental Arborvitae;CE BAI YE;Chinese Arborvitae Leaf
Function: To arrest bleeding by removing heat from blood, and to promote the growth of black hair.
Indication: Hemoptysis, duodenal bleeding, chronic bronchitis, tuberculosis, blood ejection, spontaneous external bleeding, hematuria, hematochezia, blood dysentery, incessant flooding and spotting, cough with profuse phlegm, wind-damp impediment pain, erysipelas, epidemic parotitis, scalds, burns.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Its alcoholic extract exerts antitussive and expectorant effect on mice. 2. Inhibiting the growth of various pathogenic bateria. 3. Shortening bleeding time and blood clotting time.

Function: See Fritillaria pallidiflora.
Indication: See Fritillaria pallidiflora.

Function: To clear heat and cool blood, resolve toxin and disperse swelling.
Indication: Blood ejection due to blood heat, spontaneous external bleeding, heat toxin swollen welling abscess.

Function: To resolve toxin and disperse swelling, dispel wind and relieve itch.
Indication: Swollen welling abscess, damp toxin, scab and lai, sore toxin.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, quiet heart and spirit, lower blood pressure.
Indication: Knocks and falls, sore toxin.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, disinhibit damp, free menstruation.
Indication: Lung heat cough, hemoptysis, swelling pain in throat, red and white dysentery, jaundice, menstrual disorder, amenorrhea, child gan accumulation, scrofula, eczema, lichen sore, poisonous snake bite.

Function: To dispel wind and resolve exterior, disinhibit damp and relieve itch.
Indication: Common cold with fever, wind-damp bone pain, abdominal pain and diarrhea, wind papules, eczema.

Function: To stanch bleeding and dissipate stasis, resolve toxin.
Indication: Hemoptysis, blood ejection, bleeding due to external injury, poisonous snake bite.

Function: To clear heat and dry damp, clear liver and brighten eyes.
Indication: damp-heat diarrhea dysentery, vaginal discharge, liver heat and red eyes, eye screen, oxhide lichen.

Function: To dispel stasis and relieve pain, normalize qi and transform phlegm.
Indication: Painful swelling from knocks and falls, wind-damp pain, fracture, mounting qi , common cold, cough, malaria, stomachache.

Function: To calm liver and lower blood pressure, suppress cough and dispel phlegm, promote astriction and secure astriction.
Indication: Hypertension, chronic hepatitis, cough with profuse phlegm, dysentery, emission, vaginal discharge, knocks and falls, knife wound.

Function: To clear heat, disinhibit damp, resolve toxin.
Indication: Damp-heat dysentery, strangury syndrome, mammary welling abscess, swollen boil.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, moisten lung and relieve cough, move qi and fortify stomach.
Indication: Incessant vomiting and diarrhea, abdominal pain and cramp, stomach reflux vomiting.

Function: To boost qi and fortify spleen, supplement kidney and quiet spirit, increase appetite.
Indication: Spleen-kidney yang vacuity, vacuity and hypodynamia, inappetence, aching in lumbus and knees, insomnia and frequent dreaming.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Improving tolerance to fatigue.2. Increasing the body resistance against diseases.3. Anti-inflammatory.4. LD50 is 4.75g/kg in mice.

TCM_name_en: Chinese Iris Equivalent plant: Iris halophila
Herb_latin_name: Iris lactea var. chinensis [Syn. Iris pallasii var. chinensis]
Function: To clear heat and dispel damp, resolve toxin and kill worms, stanch bleeding and settle pain.
Indication: Jaundice, strangury-turbidity, inhibited urination [=dysuria], intestinal welling abscess, worm accumulation, malaria, wind-damp pain, throat impediment, toothache, blood ejection, spontaneous external bleeding, hematochezia, flooding and spotting [=metrorrhagia and metrostaxis], swelling of sores, scrofula, mounting qi [=hernia], hemorrhoids, scalds, snake bite.

Function: To dispel wind-damp, relieve pain, kill worms and relieve itch.
Indication: Wind-heat toothache, wind-damp impediment pain, sore welling abscess and lichen lai.

Herb_pinyin_name: YI XING NAN WU WEI ZI
Function: To dispel wind and eliminate damp, move qi and relieve pain, soothe sinews and quicken network vessels.
Indication: Wind-damp impediment pain, stomachache, abdominal pain, dysmenorrhea, postpartum abdominal pain, knocks and falls, chronic pain in lumbus and legs.

UsePart: whole herb with insect gall fruit
Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, quicken blood and stanch bleeding.
Indication: Common cold, sore pharynx, taxation damage hemoptysis, dysentery, blood strangury, menstrual disorder [=menoxenia], swelling of sores, knocks and falls.

Function: To move stagnation and transform damp, stanch bleeding and dissipate stasis, dispel wind and relieve itch, resolve toxin.
Indication: Damp-stagnation obstructing internally, diarrhea, dysentery, enteritis, child gan accumulation, flooding and spotting, amenorrhea due to blood stasis, dysmenorrhea, knocks and falls, wind-damp impediment pain, hematochezia, bleeding due to external injury, itchy skin, eczema, wind papules, foot lichen, swollen welling abscess, poisonous snake bite.

Function: See Dracaena cochinchinensis .
Indication: See Dracaena cochinchinensis.

Function: To kill worms (stem), upbear yang and resolve exterior (root).
Indication: Impotence, common cold (root).

Function: To clear heat and dry damp, resolve toxin.
Indication: Damp-heat jaundice, diphtheria, nipple moth.

Function: See Rhaponticum uniflorum .
Indication: See Rhaponticum uniflorum .

Function: To promote astriction and stanch bleeding, clear heat and resolve toxin.
Indication: Hemoptysis, spontaneous external bleeding, hematochezia, hematuria, flooding and spotting, knocks and falls, innominate toxin swelling, sores.

Function: To free menstruation, disperse swelling, relieve pain, kill worms.
Indication: Concretion and conglomeration, chest impediment, amenorrhea, menstrual disorder, postpartum stasis stagnation abdominal pain, knocks and falls, swelling pain in joints, abdominal pain due to worm accumulation.

Function: To resolve toxin, dissipate stasis.
Indication: Mammary welling abscess, innominate toxin swelling, knocks and falls.

Function: To clear heat and disinhibit damp, relieve cough, stanch bleeding, resolve toxin.
Indication: Damp-heat jaundice, dysentery, edema, ascites, strangury syndrome, phlegm-damp cough, hemoptysis, blood ejection, hematochezia, flooding and spotting, bleeding due to external injury, mammary welling abscess, scrofula, hemorrhoids, scalds.

Function: See Dysosma pleiantha.
Indication: See Dysosma pleiantha .

Function: To drain precipitation and expel water, dissipate stasis and disperse swelling, resolve toxin and kill worms.
Indication: Swollen welling abscess and clove sores, sore and scab, foot lichen, eczema, snake bite, vaginitis.

Function: To interrupt malaria, clear heat and resolve toxin, stanch bleeding and disperse swelling.
Indication: Malaria, common cold with fever, lung heat cough, swelling pain in throat, mouth and tongue sores, swelling toxin of welling abscess and sore, knocks and falls, bleeding due to external injury.

Herb_latin_name: Frullania tamarisci ssp. moniliata [Syn. Frullania moniliata]
Function: To brighten eyes, clear heart, supplement kidney.
Indication: Red eyes with gall, blurred vision, vexation due to febrile disease.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, dispel wind and disinhibit damp.
Indication: Dysentery, diarrhea, child indigestion, wind-damp impediment pain, knocks and falls.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, fortify spleen and disinhibit damp, free stool.
Indication: Jaundice, summerheat-heat and vomiting diarrhea, child gan accumulation, edema, inhibited urination, habitual constipation, poisonous snake bite.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, cool blood and stanch bleeding, interrupt malaria.
Indication: Heat toxin swollen welling abscess, gum swelling and pain, poisonous snake bite, bleeding due to blood heat, bleeding due to external injury, malaria.

Function: To effuse sweat and resolve exterior, dispel wind and eliminate damp, relieve cough, stanch bleeding.
Indication: Common cold, headache, pain in joints due to rheumatalgia, cough and asthma, knocks and falls, flooding and spotting.

Function: To clear heat and disinhibit urine, rectify qi and disperse food, quicken blood and promote milk.
Indication: Edema, strangury syndrome, food accumulation distention and fullness, lump glomus, wind-damp impediment pain, menstrual disorder, galactostasis.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, cool blood, quicken blood.
Indication: infection of upper respiratory tract, tonsillitis, acute bacillary dysentery, acute enteritis, infection of urinary system, various hemorrhage, knocks and falls, menstrual disorder, wind-damp impediment pain, heat toxin sores, burns.

Function: To relieve cough and dispel phlegm, resolve toxin and kill worms.
Indication: Scab sore, copper coin lichen.

Function: To supplement spleen and warm stomach, warm kidney and invigorate yang , replenish essence .
Indication: Distention fullness in stomach duct and abdomen, edema, lumbago and limp leg, impotence, cold malaria, enduring vanquished sore.

Function: To clear heat and resolve toxin, suppress cough and interrupt malaria.
Indication: Malaria, malign malaria, common cold, ardent fever, cough with profuse phlegm.

Function: To clear heat and resolve exterior, disinhibit urine and disperse edema.
Indication: Damp-heat jaundice, nephritis with edema, distending pain in stomach duct, inappetence.

Function: For clearing heat and removing toxic substances
Indication: Common cold with fever, swelling pain in throat, mouth sore, gum swelling and pain, gum hemorrhage, red eyes with gall, swelling toxin of clove sore, acute periostitis, acute lymphangitis.

Function: Treatment of cough with much phlegm, sore throat, hoarseness of voice, lung abscess with purulent expectoration, absecess difficult to burst after suppuration.
Indication: 1. Small dosage of platycodoside, one of its active components, can increase secretion of respiratory tract and promote expectoration.2. Platycodoside may also serve as a sedative, an analgesic and an antipyretic.3. Its decoction inhibits the growth of Staphylococcus aureus and Bacillus typhoid in vitro.

Therapeutic_en_class: For desolving phlegm, stopping cougth, and soothing breathing

Function: To clear heat and disinhibit damp, cool blood and resolve toxin.
Indication: Common cold with fever, heat strangury, stone strangury, damp-heat jaundice, diarrhea, dysentery, hemoptysis, nosebleed(epistaxis), wind-fire eye, knocks and falls, bleeding due to external injury, ulcerating sores, burns and scalds, scab and lai.

UsePart: Codonopsis pilosula (Franch.) Nannf.; Codonopsis pilosula Nannf. var. modesta (Nannf.) L. T. Shen;Codonopsis tangshen Oliv. ;root
Function: Treatment of weakness of the spleen and the lung manifested by shortness of breath, cough, palpitation, anorexia, loose stools, diabetes caused by internal heat;To reinforce qi and invigorate the function of the spleen and the lung.
Indication: Treatment of weakness of the spleen and the lung manifested by shortness of breath, cough, palpitation, anorexia, loose stools, diabetes caused by internal heat;Spleen-stomach vacuity, reduced food intake and sloppy stool, lassitude in limbs, cough and asthma due to lung vacuity, shortness of breath and spontaneous sweating, qi-blood depletion.

Function: To dispel wind-heat, disperse swelling toxin.
Indication: Wind-heat common cold, headache, cough, wind toxin swollen face, swelling pain in th roat, gingiva painful swelling, wind-damp impediment pain, concretion and conglomeration, welling abscess and boil, hemorrhoids, prolapse of rectum.

Function: See Oldenlandia diffusa.
Indication: See Oldenlandia diffusa .

Function: To dispel wind and eliminate damp, quicken blood and relieve pain.
Indication: Wind-damp impediment pain, itchy skin, headache, cough.

UsePart: Gentiana macrophylla Pall.;Gentiana straminea Maxim.;Gentiana crassicaulis Duthie ex Burk.;Gentiana dahurica Fisch.
Function: Treatment of rheumatic or rheumatoid arthrits with muscular contracture and severe joint pain, fever recurring daily in the afternoon, fever in infants with malnutrition.
Indication: 1. Inhibiting experimental arthritis in mice and decreasing capillary permeability.2. Anti-allergric.3. Inducing transient hypotensive effect.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Inhibiting experimental arthritis in mice and decreasing capillary permeability.2. Anti-allergric.3. Inducing transient hypotensive effect.

Function: To relieve rheumatic conditions, and to remove damp-heat.
Indication: Wind-damp impediment pain, hypertonicity of sinews and vessels, aching pain in joints, late afternoon tidal fever, child gan accumulation with fever.
Clinical_manifestations: 1. Inhibiting experimental arthritis in mice and decreasing capillary permeability.2. Anti-allergric.3. Inducing transient hypotensive effect.

Function: To fortify spleen and stomach, supplement qi and blood, moisten dryness and transform phlegm.
Indication: Vacuity taxation with marked emaciation, wind stroke with hemiplegia, phlegm-rheum and glomus accumulation.

Function: To dispel wind and eliminate damp, relieve pain.
Indication: Wind-damp impediment pain, pain wind.

TCM_name: 夕阳接骨木;西洋接骨木
Function: See Sambucus williamsii.
Indication: See Sambucus williamsii.

Function: See Lilium brownii var. viridulum .
Indication: See Lilium brownii var. viridulum.

Function: To dispel wind-damp, dissipate stasis and disperse swelling.
Indication: Distention fullness in chest and diaphragm, dysphagia-occlusion, cough and heavy head (flower), knocks and falls, flat abscess (leaf).

Function: To settle fright, harmonize stomach, resolve toxin and outthrust papules, engender flesh and stanch bleeding.
Indication: Gastric ulcer, duodenal ulcer, epilepsy, child indigestion, measles papules, sore and boil, bleeding due to external injury.

Function: To nourish n and blood and promote the production of body fluid.
Indication: Its contains sugar, organic acid , vitamins B1, B2 and C and carotene. Its oleum contains oleic acid and linoleic acid.
Clinical_manifestations: Its contains sugar, organic acid , vitamins B1, B2 and C and carotene. Its oleum contains oleic acid and linoleic acid.

Herb_latin_name: Rhinoceros unicornis , Rhinoceros sondaicus , Rhinoceros sumatrensis
Function: To cool blood, clear heat, resolve toxin, settle fright.
Indication: Blood ejection, spontaneous external bleeding, acute febrile diseases, epidemic febrile diseases.
